SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.utils

Class GameObjectConverter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.utils.GameObjectConverter
public class GameObjectConverter extends Object
This class implements methods that help converting complex objects into their simplified description. Methods perform the subsequent operations
  1. ObjectCards are mapped to their type
  2. Boards are transformed into matrices of ObjectTypeEnum objects if a card is present in a position (null otherwise)
  3. Shelves are tranformed into matrices of ObjectTypeEnum objects if a card is present in a position (null otherwise)
  4. PersonalGoalCards are mapped to their id
  5. CommonGoalCards are mapped to their id and their pointCard list into a SimplifiedCommonGoalCard
These methods are useful for exchanging simple objects through the network, as a client only needs a simple description of each game object.
Author:
Luca Guffanti
